question: Show press conferences and media scrums from Jack Layton.
sql_query1:
SELECT Sources.name 
FROM Sources
WHERE (Sources.event = "Press Conference" OR Sources.event = "Media Scrum") AND Sources.person = "Jack Layton"
sql_query2:
SELECT Sources.name 
FROM Sources
WHERE Sources.event = "Press Conference" OR Sources.event = "Media Scrum" AND Sources.person = "Jack Layton"
interpretation1: Which press conferences are from Jack Layton and which media scrums are from the same person?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all press conferences and also provide a list of media scrums from Jack Layton.
